channel.title: Earnings Miss on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Earnings Miss on FinanClub

item.title: INFY
item.description: score:208 Chances: Infosys welcomes tennis world No.1 Iga Świątek and tennis icon Rafael Nadal as brand ambassadors, enhancing global brand presence. Infosys Foundation USA invests $200,000 to boost tech careers through collaboration, reflecting corporate social responsibility. Infosys expands strategic collaboration with Liberty Global to bring AI-powered digital entertainment to customers worldwide, indicating growth potential.

item.title: NEM
item.description: score:58 Chances: Newmont Corporation is proceeding with its acquisition of Newcrest, having received regulatory clearances from Australia and Korea, which could open up new growth opportunities. The company is operating in the gold mining industry, which tends to perform well during economic uncertainties, making it an attractive investment option for investors seeking a safe haven.
